info.title: Activity Management Service
info.description:
The Activity Management Service provides the API operations for running, monitoring, and managing activities in Synergy Studio. 
The Activity Monitor in Synergy Studio generates activity logs for the submitted activities.fg You can use this log to view the detailed log or the error summary section in the API response.

requestBody.description: The creation of the activity is in progress.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about one or more activities associated with the user's tenant specified in the request.

200.description: Contains a list of activities that you have chosen to retrieve.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about of an activity associated with the user's tenant specified in the request.

patch.description: Modifies the activity associated with the specified activity ID.

get.description: Retrieves the status of the activity specified in the request.

post.description: Cancels the activity identified by the unique activity ID in the request.

202.description:
Request accepted, and the asynchronous cancellation process is ongoing.

The response message validates whether the passed activity sid is a cancellable activity.

post.description: Resubmits the activity specified by the activity ID, generating a new activity with a different activity ID.

get.summary: Get a ActivityDefinition record by Id
get.description: Get a ActivityDefinition record by Id

get.summary: Get the ActivityDefinition records for specified Id
get.description: Get the ActivityDefinition records for specified Id

get.summary: Returns activity statistics for the specified tenant
get.description: Returns activity statistics for the specified tenant.

dateCreated.description: The system-generated date and time when the activity is initiated.

dateFinished.description: The date and time generated by the system when the activity is completed.

dateModified.description: The date and time generated by the system when the activity is modified and resubmitted.

dateScheduled.description: The date and time specified by the user to schedule the submission of an activity.

dateStarted.description: The start date and time of the activity when it is initiated.

duration.description: The duration of the activity, in seconds.

percentCompleted.description: The percentage of the activity that is completed.

sid.description: The system-assigned identifier for the activity.

Activity.description: An activity refers to the analysis that a user initiates within the platform.

ActivityActions.description: Contains the status of each activity.

ActivityCollection.description: Contains a list of activity objects with detailed information for reporting purposes. Each activity object includes the activity sid, creation, modification, and completion dates, the progress of the activity, its duration, the scheduled time, and tenant details like who created the activity and when.

ActivityDefinition.description: Contains the activity status and user metadata, including details such as who created the activity, who modified it, when it was modified, product ID, and version.

ActivityDefinitionCollection.description: A collection of activity definition objects. Each object in the array identifies a specific activity definition and its corresponding metadata information.

id.description: Contains the unique identifier of the activity.

ActivityDefinitionInfo.description: Contains the name of the activity supported by the platform.

ActivityMetrics.description: Contains a counter to track the activities by state and unique activity definition sid.

ActivityMetricsByActivityDefinition.description: Contains the activity metrics by unique activity definition ID for reporting purposes.

ActivityMetricsByState.description: Contains the activity metrics by state of the activity for reporting purposes.

ActivityStage.description: Contains activity details such as the unique ID of the activity creator (associated with a tenant), creation date, last modified date, and progress of the activity.

ActivityState.title: ActivityState
ActivityState.description: The state of the activity submitted to the platform.

ActivityStatus.title: ActivityStatus
ActivityStatus.description: Represents the progress of an activity.

NewActivity.description: Contains the new activity details such as the unique ID and name of the activity, creator (associated with a tenant), and other metadata tags that the creator associated with this new activity.

NewActivityDefinition.description: Contains the activity definition details for the new activity, including its state, unique identifier, step function, and stage.

Stage.description: Indicates the stage of a specific activity on the platform.

StageOverride.description: Indicates whether the activity has any override.

definitionId.name: definitionId
definitionId.description: The ID of the activity definition.

definitionVersion.name: definitionVersion
definitionVersion.description: The version of the activity definition.

skip.name: skip
skip.description: The number of records to skip before retrieving new records.

count.name: count
count.description: The number of records to retrieve.

orderBy.name: orderBy
orderBy.description: The order to return the records.
